Biographies

  • Seven Lions biography

    Seven Lions, real name Jeff Montalvo, is an American record producer and DJ from Santa Barbara, California. Born in 1987, the dubstep and chillstep DJ has released three EPs since 2012.

    Read more
  • Pegboard Nerds biography

    Pegboard Nerds are a Danish/ Norweigan duet that consist of Alexander Odden and Michael Parsberg. They are known for producing electronic dance music.

    Read more
